text: President Maithripala Sirisena has appointed a oneman Presidential Committee to investigate the causes that led to the Meethotamulla tragedy.The President has appointed retired High Court judge Chandradasa Nanayakkara for this Committee.President Maithripala Sirisena has appointed a oneman Presidential Committee to investigate the causes that led to the Meethotamulla tragedy.The President has appointed retired High Court judge Chandradasa Nanayakkara for this Committee.
title: Presidential Committee on Meethotamulla tragedy announced
